resources.string: This is a lightweight tool to transfer files between your Android phone and your macOS devices.

1. Install and launch AnDrop for mac on your macOS device from the App Store.

 2. Share any file on your Android device with AnDrop.

 3. Select your target macOS device.

 5. Profit! Your file is now in the Download folder of your macOS device.
To share this file you need to grant AnDrop storage access permission
